recipesJson.name: Good Ol' Days
recipesJson.author: Thadentman
recipesJson.description: From the moment I smelled Purilum cookie I knew this recipe was going to be simple, It needs 2 weeks for the cream to set up

reviews.text: After a steep this comes together beautifully. Pur cookie really is something special to behold and the dentman never ceases to amaze. This isn't the in-your-face experience you come to expect with a cereal. It's far more subtle and accurate while having a nice all-encompassing sweetness that makes it easy to all day vape. Job well-done buddy.

Seems like a very well put together recipe but as a Shake and Vape I was disappointed- I think this is due to the low flavoring percentage. I'll give it a few weeks and give it another try! Thanks for sharing :-)
